text: Audacity is a digital audio editor (a computer program used to change sounds) and recording program. Audacity is cross-platform and can be used with Windows, OS X, Linux, and BSD. It is free software. Audacity was first released on May 28, 2000. == Features == # multi-track mixing # import and export of WAV, AIFF, MP3 == References == == Other websites == * Audacity homepage * Audacity Wiki * Editing audio in Linux:Audacity * Useful information, FAQ and articles about Audacity Audacity Category:Audio technology Category:Music software Category:Free software
title: Audacity
